birth_place.zh-cn: 京师顺天府太平湖醇亲王府南府

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期政治人物，道光帝之孙，醇亲王奕𫍽第五子，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。清朝最后一位实际统治者，担任监国摄政王。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, grandson of the Daoguang Emperor, fifth son of Yixuan, Prince Chun, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and biological father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). He was the last de facto ruler of the Qing dynasty, serving as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，道光帝第七子，咸丰帝异母弟，封为醇亲王。载沣和光绪帝的父亲。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the seventh son of the Daoguang Emperor, and half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor. He was granted the title Prince Chun. He was the father of Zaifeng and the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 醇亲王奕𫍽的侧福晋，载沣、载洵、载涛的生母。
description.en: A secondary consort of Yixuan, Prince Chun, and the biological mother of Zaifeng, Zaixun, and Zaitao.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十一位皇帝，奕𫍽第二子，载沣的异母兄。被过继给咸丰帝，继承同治帝的皇位。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, the second son of Yixuan, and the elder half-brother of Zaifeng. He was adopted as the son of the Xianfeng Emperor to succeed the Tongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝，年号宣统。载沣长子。后任满洲国执政及皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing dynasty and the final emperor of China, with the era name Xuantong. He was the eldest son of Zaifeng. He later served as the Chief Executive and Emperor of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 载沣的正妻，大学士荣禄之女，溥仪和溥杰的生母。
description.en: The primary consort of Zaifeng, daughter of the Grand Secretary Ronglu, and the biological mother of Puyi and Pujie.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，慈禧太后的心腹。其女瓜尔佳氏嫁与载沣。
description.en: An influential minister in the late Qing dynasty and a confidant of Empress Dowager Cixi. His daughter, Gūwalgiya, married Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重要政治人物，咸丰帝的妃子，同治帝的生母。自1861年至1908年期间，作为皇太后及太皇太后，是清朝的实际统治者。
description.en: An influential political figure in the late Qing dynasty, a consort of the Xianfeng Emperor, and the mother of the Tongzhi Emperor. From 1861 to 1908, as Empress Dowager and Grand Empress Dowager, she was the de facto ruler of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的皇后，慈禧太后的侄女。在宣统年间与载沣共同主政，并最终颁布了《宣统帝退位诏书》。
description.en: The empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor and a niece of Empress Dowager Cixi. She co-ruled with Zaifeng during the Xuantong era and ultimately issued the Imperial Edict of the Abdication of the Xuantong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年为辅佐幼帝而设立的职位，由载沣担任，代行皇帝处理国政。
description.en: A position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young emperor, held by Zaifeng, who exercised imperial power in handling state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第八位皇帝，奕𫍽的父亲，载沣的祖父。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Qing dynasty, father of Yixuan, and grandfather of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，道光帝第四子，奕𫍽的异母兄。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Daoguang Emperor, and the elder half-brother of Yixuan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清名臣、洋务派代表人物。曾建议慈禧太后立载沣为帝，后又建议授其摄政王之名。
description.en: A prominent official in the late Qing dynasty and a representative of the Self-Strengthening Movement. He once suggested to Empress Dowager Cixi that Zaifeng be made emperor, and later suggested granting him the title of Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，早期为革命党人，曾策划暗杀摄政王载沣。
description.en: A Chinese politician, an early revolutionary who plotted the assassination of Prince-Regent Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命的开端，直接导致清朝的统治危机和最终覆灭，也促使载沣失去摄政王权力。
description.en: The beginning of the Xinhai Revolution, which directly led to the crisis and eventual collapse of Qing rule, and also caused Zaifeng to lose his power as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 晚清末任内阁总理大臣，中华民国第一任正式大总统。在辛亥革命中夺取了载沣的权力，并最终迫使清帝退位。
description.en: The last Prime Minister of the late Qing dynasty and the first formal President of the Republic of China. He seized power from Zaifeng during the Xinhai Revolution and eventually forced the Qing emperor to abdicate.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，1932年在中国东北地区扶植建立了满洲国。
description.en: An East Asian country that established the puppet state of Manchukuo in Northeast China in 1932.

description.zh-cn: 由日本在中国东北建立的傀儡政权，以溥仪为国家元首。
description.en: A puppet state established by Japan in Northeast China, with Puyi as its head of state.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃子。在清室退位后，曾训斥载沣之妻瓜尔佳氏，致其自尽。
description.en: A consort of the Guangxu Emperor. After the abdication of the Qing court, she scolded Zaifeng's wife, Gūwalgiya, which led to her suicide.

description.zh-cn: 载沣次子，溥仪之弟。
description.en: The second son of Zaifeng and younger brother of Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是醇贤亲王奕𫍽的第五子。
description.en: Zaifeng was the fifth son of Yixuan, Prince Chun.

description.zh-cn: 载沣的生母是奕𫍽的侧福晋刘佳氏。
description.en: Zaifeng's biological mother was Yixuan's secondary consort, Lady Liuja.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是光绪帝（载湉）的异母弟。
description.en: Zaifeng was the younger half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor (Zaitian).

description.zh-cn: 溥仪是载沣的长子。
description.en: Puyi was the eldest son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 溥杰是载沣的次子。
description.en: Pujie was the second son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 载沣的元配是大学士荣禄之女瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: Zaifeng's first wife was Lady Gūwalgiya, the daughter of Grand Secretary Ronglu.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪的生母是嫡福晋瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: Puyi's biological mother was the primary consort, Lady Gūwalgiya.

description.zh-cn: 溥杰的生母是嫡福晋瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: Pujie's biological mother was the primary consort, Lady Gūwalgiya.

description.zh-cn: 奕𫍽是道光皇帝的第七子。
description.en: Yixuan was the seventh son of the Daoguang Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在光绪帝驾崩后，慈禧太后下达懿旨，指定载沣长子溥仪入嗣大统，继承皇位。
description.en: After the death of the Guangxu Emperor, Empress Dowager Cixi issued an edict appointing Zaifeng's eldest son, Puyi, to succeed to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在立溥仪为帝的同时，慈禧太后下懿旨授载沣为摄政王，辅佐幼帝。
description.en: While appointing Puyi as emperor, Empress Dowager Cixi also issued an edict making Zaifeng the Prince-Regent to assist the young emperor.

description.zh-cn: 1908年，载沣被授为监国摄政王，辅佐其子宣统帝，直至1911年12月辞职。
description.en: In 1908, Zaifeng was appointed Prince-Regent to assist his son, the Xuantong Emperor, a position he held until his resignation in December 1911.

description.zh-cn: 在宣统年间，载沣作为监国摄政王与隆裕太后同为清朝实际上的最高统治者，遇有重大事件需请太后懿旨。
description.en: During the Xuantong era, Zaifeng, as Prince-Regent, and Empress Dowager Longyu were the de facto supreme rulers of the Qing dynasty; major events required the Empress Dowager's edict.

description.zh-cn: 在决定光绪帝继任者时，张之洞曾与世续共同上奏，建议直接拥立载沣为帝，后又建议给予他摄政王的封号。
description.en: When deciding the successor to the Guangxu Emperor, Zhang Zhidong, along with Shixu, proposed to enthrone Zaifeng directly as emperor, and later suggested granting him the title of Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后拒绝了张之洞等人径立载沣为帝的建议，而是选择立其子溥仪为帝，由载沣摄政。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi rejected the proposal from Zhang Zhidong and others to directly enthrone Zaifeng, choosing instead to make his son Puyi the emperor with Zaifeng as regent.

description.zh-cn: 1910年，革命党人汪精卫等人策划了针对摄政王载沣的暗杀行动，但未能成功。
description.en: In 1910, revolutionary Wang Jingwei and others plotted an assassination attempt against Prince-Regent Zaifeng, but it was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义的爆发引发了全国性的辛亥革命，导致清廷统治动摇，载沣被迫交出权力并辞去摄政王之位。
description.en: The outbreak of the Wuchang Uprising triggered the nationwide Xinhai Revolution, shaking Qing rule and forcing Zaifeng to relinquish power and resign as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后，袁世凯被清廷重新启用，他组成责任内阁，逐步掌握实权，导致载沣大权旁落并最终辞职。
description.en: After the Wuchang Uprising, Yuan Shikai was reinstated by the Qing court. He formed a responsible cabinet, gradually seizing real power, which led to Zaifeng being sidelined and eventually resigning.

description.zh-cn: 在袁世凯的进言下，隆裕太后命令载沣辞去监国摄政王的职位。
description.en: At Yuan Shikai's suggestion, Empress Dowager Longyu ordered Zaifeng to resign from his position as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 1932年，日本在中国东北地区扶植建立了傀儡政权满洲国。
description.en: In 1932, Japan established the puppet state of Manchukuo in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 日本方面将溥仪安排为满洲国的国家元首（初为执政，后为皇帝）。
description.en: The Japanese installed Puyi as the head of state of Manchukuo (initially as Chief Executive, later as Emperor).

description.zh-cn: 载沣曾反对其子溥仪前往东北就任日本傀儡政权满洲国的元首，但未能阻止。
description.en: Zaifeng opposed his son Puyi's decision to go to Northeast China to become the head of the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo, but was unable to stop him.

description.zh-cn: 载沣的嫡福晋瓜尔佳氏因受到端康太妃的训斥，而服毒自尽。
description.en: Zaifeng's primary consort, Lady Gūwalgiya, committed suicide by taking poison after being reprimanded by Imperial Noble Consort Duankang.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝（载湉）被过继给伯父咸丰帝为嗣子。
description.en: The Guangxu Emperor (Zaitian) was adopted as the heir of his paternal uncle, the Xianfeng Emperor.
